file_content.text: Start talking. How'd you get this list?
Some guy! Said he was a Mandalorian! He got me the codes to break in.
Said I could sell the names and make a fortune.
I want a name.
Who's your source?
I never met the guy! I got contacted via holo. He kept his face hidden and disguised his voice.
He just gave you the codes and said "get rich"? I don't buy it.
Sounds fishy.
It wasn't a handout. There were conditions! I got the money, he got... well, I don't know.
You deserve this, moron.
Greedy, and stupid.
No! Wait! Please! You're right! I'm a nobody, you want the guy responsible!
He said targets assigned to Tarro Blood were off-limits. Maybe he has money on this Blood guy winning.
Or Tarro Blood gave this slicer the list.
We have to expect Tarro to pull some stunts like this.
Hardly unexpected.
I can't imagine Blood getting his own hands this dirty.
Likely one of his cronies.
That man has lived way longer than he has any right to.
After we mop up here we'll get back to the Great Hunt. And Tarro Blood.
He'll die just like this guy.
That'll help you find him, right? I've told you everything I know! Please, just let me go! I'll never talk about that list again! I swear!
You're right. You won't.
Very true. [Kill him]
Who else knows the contents of this list?
Are there other copies?
Nem'ro's paymaster, Juda, helped me arrange the auction! She has another copy.
I agreed to split the profits with her fifty-fifty!
In fact, with everyone here dead, Juda's the only one left who knows about the list. Please, let me go.
Afraid I can't do that.
Too risky. [Kill him]
You have to disappear. Forever. Got it?
Run while you can.
Sorry, this is my favorite part of the job.
This is more fun. [Kill him]
All right. Get out of here.
No one will know I even existed!
Don't kill me! Take the datapad!
You ain't listening! I don't want the whole list! I just wanna know if my name's on it!
An excellent point. What if we're only interested in certain names?
I'm sure we could come to some arrangement. That's what this auction is all about.
How about I just bleed you nice and slow then take the list from your cold, dead hand?
Back off. I need him alive, for now.
I've got business with him.
You talkin' to me, wimp? I don't think you realize where you are.
Look around! We're the most wanted killers in the galaxy! Anyone here could rip you limb from limb.
Let's try to keep this civil, okay? If you're not here to bid, please leave.
Looks like you're in way over your head.
You can't control this mob.
Hey, chuff-sucker, sit down and shut it, or you're dead!
Look, everybody calm down. This list is encrypted. I die and nobody gets it.
I say we kill this worm and get another slicer to crack the pad.
Suits us fine.
Then I'll turn around and take it from yours, freak.
This auction is over. [Attack]
Blast this scum!
No! Stop! Aieee!
